data.comment: The match is underway in Daegu.
Ulsan Hyundai have been awarded a corner by Kim Woo-sung.
In the minute 1, Ulsan Hyundai to take a throw-in in Daegu territory.
Kim Woo-sung signals a throw-in for Ulsan Hyundai, close to Daegu's area.
Throw-in for Daegu in the half of Ulsan Hyundai.
In the minute 6, Throw-in Daegu.
Cesinha gets his shot on target but fails to score for Daegu.
Kim Woo-sung signals a free kick to Daegu in their own half.
In the minute 13, Daegu have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Daegu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Daegu.
In the minute 16, Dejan Damjanovic (Daegu) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Daegu.
Daegu's Jeong Seung-won gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 16, Goal kick for Ulsan Hyundai at Daegu Stadium.
In Daegu Ulsan Hyundai drive forward through Seol Young-woo. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Ulsan Hyundai have been awarded a corner by Kim Woo-sung.
In the minute 20, Free kick for Ulsan Hyundai in their own half.
Shin Chang-moo (Daegu) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Daegu.
In the minute 22, Daegu take a 1-0 lead thanks to Cesinha.
Great play from Park Han-Bin to set up the goal.
Seol Young-woo (Ulsan Hyundai) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 27, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Ulsan Hyundai close to the penalty box.
Junior Negrao is on target to level the scores at 1-1.
In the minute 30, In Daegu a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Kim Woo-sung signals a free kick to Daegu.
Free kick for Daegu in the half of Ulsan Hyundai.
In the minute 34, Junior Negrao for Ulsan Hyundai drives towards goal at Daegu Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Ulsan Hyundai awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 37, Ball goes out of play for a Daegu goal kick.
At Daegu Stadium, Park Han-Bin has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Free kick Ulsan Hyundai.
Ulsan Hyundai have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 40, Can Ulsan Hyundai get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Daegu's half?
Throw-in high up the field for Ulsan Hyundai in Daegu.
Ulsan Hyundai have been awarded a corner by Kim Woo-sung.
In the minute 44, Free kick for Daegu in their own half.
Junior Negrao for Ulsan Hyundai is whistled offside.
The 1st half is prolonged by 2 minutes of added time.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Ulsan Hyundai at Daegu Stadium.
Kim Woo-sung blows to end the first-half.
Kim Dae-won is replacing Dejan Damjanovic for Daegu at Daegu Stadium.
In the minute 46, The second-half has started.
Free kick for Daegu in the half of Ulsan Hyundai.
Kim Tae-hwan is on target to give Ulsan Hyundai a 1-2 advantage.
In the minute 53, Corner awarded to Ulsan Hyundai.
Kim Woo-sung awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Daegu in their own half.
In the minute 55, Daegu have been awarded a corner by Kim Woo-sung.
Daegu drives forward and Kim Dae-won gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Cesinha (Daegu) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 59, Jeong Seung-won of Daegu gets in a strike, but is off target.
Kim Woo-sung awards Ulsan Hyundai a goal kick.
Kim Do-Hoon is making the team's first substitution at Daegu Stadium with Bjorn Johnsen replacing Junior Negrao.
In the minute 63, Corner awarded to Ulsan Hyundai.
Ulsan Hyundai make their second substitution with Lee Dong-kyeong replacing Seol Young-woo.
Corner awarded to Ulsan Hyundai.
In the minute 66, Daegu's Shin Chang-moo breaks free at Daegu Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Ulsan Hyundai goal kick.
Daegu have been awarded a corner by Kim Woo-sung.
In the minute 67, Goal kick for Ulsan Hyundai at Daegu Stadium.
Kim Woo-sung signals a free kick to Daegu in their own half.
Daegu are pushing forward but Cesinha's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 69, Ulsan Hyundai have a goal kick.
Daegu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Daegu, Kim Dae-won of Daegu is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 73, Can Ulsan Hyundai capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Daegu's half?
In Daegu Ulsan Hyundai attack through Won Du-jae. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Daegu.
In the minute 75, Lee Byeong-keun (Daegu) is making a second substitution, with Lee Jin-hyun replacing Shin Chang-moo.
Ball safe as Ulsan Hyundai is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Kim Woo-sung signals a Daegu throw-in in Ulsan Hyundai's half.
In the minute 79, Free kick Daegu.
Jeong Seung-won for Daegu gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Kim Woo-sung awards Ulsan Hyundai a goal kick.
In the minute 81, Daegu's Ryu Jae-moon gets in a shot on goal at Daegu Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
The home team have replaced Tsubasa Nishi with Oh Hu-seong. This is the third substitution made today by Lee Byeong-keun.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Daegu.
In the minute 84, Kim Kee-hee is replacing Lee Dong-kyeong for the away team.
Goal kick for Ulsan Hyundai at Daegu Stadium.
Daegu push forward at Daegu Stadium and Park Han-Bin gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Ulsan Hyundai defence.
Daegu have been awarded a corner by Kim Woo-sung.
Kim Woo-sung will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Ulsan Hyundai awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ulsan Hyundai's Dave Bulthuis gets in a shot on goal at Daegu Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
The match is over. Final score 2-2.
Goal! Park Han-Bin levels the match at 2-2.
